RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOOD IDEA away alertly, prompted the pace along the rail for a half, assumed command, set the balance of the pace and widened through the stretch to win easily. BEYOND MY DREAMS vied for the lead three wide and was no match for the winner. MASTER OF WAR allowed to settle, passed tiring rivals through the stretch in the five path. HONORABLE stumbled at the start, sped to the lead in the three path on the first turn, set the pace for a little over a half mile in the two path, remained a sharp threat into the stretch then weakened. PHARAOH'S PROPHECY had speed four wide and weakened on the far turn. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION RACE WAS ORIGINALLY HAND TIMED. FINAL CHANGED AND FRACTIONS PROVIDED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Good Idea
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, rail move, much the best, easily,

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond My Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Master of War
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, passed tiring rivals 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Honorable
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, rushed to lead, early pace 2path, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In WeightAllowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILD OX pressed the pace three then two wide, responded under left handed urging through the stretch and was along in time. MIDNIGHT WARSHIP away alertly, set the pace along the inside until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. MOESTER trailed early then found his best stride late in the five path and got up for third. TIDE RISING pressured the winner early two wide and weakened on the turn. CHOCOLATE PHILLING was no factor. KEEPING SCORE was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Warship
ENTRY.OWNER: Mitten Mates LLC and D & D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Ox
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, rallied left handed urging, in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For$7,500 O r Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REINVESTEDINTEREST pressed the pace three then two wide into the turn, made the lead, widened into the stretch under left handed urging and won under confident handling. RECKLESS L J never far back, rallied into the stretch in the three path and finished well clear for second. OHIO PLAYER with the second flight, went evenly. KISSINGER failed to menace. NEBULOSA set a pressured pace two wide then along the inside into the turn, had speed into the stretch then weakened. MURRY SPUR was outrun. OHIO MUNNY pressed the pace along the inside and was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Reinvestedinterest
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, assumed command turn, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Reckless L J
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally 3path, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 56. Claiming Purse 17100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY FORTUNE with the second flight along the inside, shifted out midway on the turn, rallied determinedly under left handed urging while drifting out and was along in time. EXACTITUDE stalked the pace three wide in the five path into the turn, rallied to make the lead at the top of the stretch, dropped inside, drew clear before the furlong marker then couldn't handle the winner. PATTI LOU allowed to settle, had a mild rally late in the four path. SHADY BABY away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then weakened in the final furlong. BEAUTIFUL VICTORIA failed to menace. BUSYBEING FABULOUS battled for the lead two wide for nearly a half then gave way in the stretch. ALL THE BEST was outrun. SKIPSHOT LILLY was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Shady Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, angled out turn, late surge 6path, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Exactitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, turn, shook clear, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Patti Lou
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, mild rally late 4path
